chapterOne.title: GOLDEN FOUNDATION
chapterOne.description: Long-grain Basmati, infused with the essence of Saffron and eighteen distinct Yemeni spices.

chapterTwo.title: THE SMOKED SOUL
chapterTwo.description: Slow-cooked in a traditional 'Teboon' underground oven. Transformed by the gentle heat of charcoal and oak.

signature.title: CHEF'S MANDI RIBS.
signature.description: Our most celebrated dish. Smoked for twelve hours and glazed with our signature honey-chili reduction. A marriage of tradition and modern culinary art.

hero.title: OUR STORY.
hero.description: Mandi is not just a dish; it's a centuries-old tradition born in the rugged mountains of Yemen and perfected in our smokehouses.

philosophy.title: THE RITE OF SMOKE.
philosophy.description: We believe in the slow way. We cook our meat underground for twelve hours, allowing the gentle heat of charcoal to tenderize every fiber without losing a drop of juice.

mission.text: To preserve the soul of Yemenite cuisine while serving it on a global stage of luxury.
